text: Laurens Jan Brinkhorst (born 18 March 1937) is a retired Dutch Democrats 66 (D66) politician. He was the Minister of Economic Affairs and Deputy Prime Minister of the Netherlands during the government of Jan Peter Balkenende. He is a Senior Network Member at the European Leadership Network (ELN). ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:Ambassadors of the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Democrats 66 politicians Category:Dutch judges Category:Dutch lawyers Category:Dutch activists Category:Dutch writers Category:Dutch academics Category:People from Leiden
title: Laurens Jan Brinkhorst
